statements: DELETE FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_id = 1 AND survey_name = 'Politics'
DELETE FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_topic = 'Economy' AND respondent_gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM PollResults WHERE poll_id = 1 AND response_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Surveys WHERE total_responses < 100 AND survey_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM SurveyResponses WHERE participant_id = 2 AND question_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM Poll_Results WHERE result_id = 10 AND participant_id = 5;
